body_html:
I would also mention that retain_grad()'s description in the documentation says non-leaf Variables, which it is not clear. What is and is not a leaf Variable is confusing when many, including myself, would think that when you slice a leaf Variable, you are still working with a Variable that is a leaf in the sense that it is the same data, just a subsection of it. It may be a new lower-case "v" variable, but isn't obviously a new upper-case "V" Variable.

Just a suggestion that would help to clarify usage.
